item.title: Create the Manual Test Launch configuration
item.description:
Select in the menubar at the top of the workbench Run->Run Configuration
On the left pane, select GW4E Manual test Launcher, and press the New button to create a configuration.
A form is now displayed on the right pane.
Click the Browse button, and select the manualTest project.
Click the Browse button, and select the search.json model file.
Click the combo box, and select the random(edge_coverage(100)) as path generator/stop condition.
Click the Omit Edge(s) Without Description check box button.
Click the Apply.
The configuration is now created.
We can run it !
Click the Run button to open the wizard. You can see a summary of the configuration.

item.title: Generating the manual test
item.description:
There are now two options :
1 - You follow the wizard, execute the actions and enter results in the text field for the verification steps until you reach the wizard summary
2 - You follow the wizard, but you don't execute the actions and just click the Next button until you reach the wizard summary
The first option leads to a test case result with containing all steps and the results you've entered. The file could be sent to the developers if any problems have been raised.
The second option leads to a test case template containing all steps without any result. The template could be then send to the tester.
In this tutorial, we choose the option 2.
Click Next button and take time to see the content of the pages, until you reach the Summary Execution Page
You can see a summary of all steps taken in this manual test configuration.
Click Next button . We will now feed the details to persist the manual test.
Click the option Export as a test template
Under the combo box Select or Enter a workbook file", there is a text field
Enter mytemplate.xlsx
Enter Manual Campaign as workbook title
Enter Case 1 as test case id
Enter Web Page as Component
Select a priority for the test case
Click the Finish button
As you can see, a file named mytemplate.xlsx has been created. It is your manual test case.

item.title: Viewing the manual test case
item.description: Double click the file named mytemplate.xlsx, to open it and view the content of the manual test case.
